# MIG tips

## naming conventions

- Mname = name of working column 
- MNAME = final name of column

## process

- *wip_tab* = work-in-progress tab (try everything out here)
- *mod_tab* = result of modifications, source for building od a mus_tab
- *mus_tab* = final CSV for import
